mapper.select: SELECT USER_SEQ,USER_EMAIL,USER_PHONE,USER_BIRTH,JOINDATE,USER_NAME,USER_GENDER FROM TB_USER ORDER BY USER_SEQ DESC

SELECT USER_SEQ, RENT_STATUS, RESVE_STATUS FROM ( SELECT U.USER_SEQ AS USER_SEQ, BR.RENT_STATUS AS RENT_STATUS, R.RESVE_STATUS AS RESVE_STATUS FROM TB_USER U LEFT JOIN TB_BOOK_RENT BR ON U.USER_SEQ = BR.USER_SEQ LEFT JOIN TB_RESVE R ON U.USER_SEQ = R.USER_SEQ WHERE U.USER_SEQ = #{user_seq} ORDER BY BR.RENT_SEQ DESC, R.RESVE_SEQ DESC ) WHERE ROWNUM = 1
